2081.SR.summary: Alkhorayef Water & Power Technologies designs, constructs, operates, maintains, and manages water and wastewater projects in Saudi Arabia. It provides engineering, procurement, and construction; and operation and maintenance services. The company's services cover domestic and industrial wastewater plants, water treatment plants, water desalination plants, water and wastewater networks and house connections, filtration solutions and membrane systems, main water and sewage lines, strategic tanks, pump/lifting stations, electro-mechanical works, storm water, and water well projects. Its customers include government agencies and institutions, such as Ministry of Water and Electricity, National Water Company, MODON, Sabic, Aramco, Marafiq, Royal Commission, SWCC, Ministry of Defense, etc. The company is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
